name: SMARTAhome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn on the switch”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your SMARTA products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “SMARTA home” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “SMARTA home” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “SMARTA home” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:

Light
Alexa, turn on the light.
Alexa, dim the lights.
Alexa, set the lights to blue.

Plug
Alexa, turn on the smart plug.
Alexa, turn off the smart plug.

Switch
Alexa, turn on the switch.
Alexa, turn off the switch.

Curtain
Alexa, open the curtain.
Alexa, close the curtain.
Alexa, open the curtain to 60%.

Fan
Alexa, turn on the fan.
Alexa, what is the fan speed?
Alexa, set the fan speed to 1.

Thermostat
Alexa, turn on the thermostat.
Alexa, set the thermostat to auto.
Alexa, what is the thermostat set to?

Diffuser
Alexa, turn on the diffuser.
Alexa, turn off the diffuser.
